alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 2:45AM PST until February 24 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow showers are expected to arrive on Thursday. Total snow accumulations 8 to 12 inches for elevations above 2000 ft with up to 16 inches above 3000 ft. A dusting down to 1500 feet is possible through Friday night, before snow showers taper off. * WHERE...Above 1500 ft in the Interior North Bay Mountains. * WHEN...10 AM PST Thursday through 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Slick, snow-covered roads and hiking trails. Hikers, campers, and outdoor enthusiasts may encounter dangerous winter- like conditions above the snow level. Heavier snow showers could produce limited visibilities. Downed trees and power outages possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will accompany this snowfall, which may result in reduced visibilities.
